short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches and displays Kogan Mobile usage summary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Effortlessly Track Your Kogan Mobile Plan
🔑 Log in to your Kogan Mobile account.
📌 Click the extension icon.
📅 Instantly view your plan's expiration date and usage details.

🌍 Check Anywhere, Anytime
🚀 No need to stay on the Kogan Mobile website! Simply click the extension icon to check your data, even when you're browsing elsewhere.
🔔 Get notifications when your data is running low!

🔒 Your Privacy Matters
✅ Everything runs locally in your browser.
✅ Data comes directly from Kogan Mobile—no servers, no data storage.
🛡️ 100% safe and secure!

⭐ If this extension helped you, please leave a positive review!
